FlowGraph
Table of Contents

API Reference

This section contains the auto-generated API documentation for FlowGraph.

Namespaces

FlowGraph.Core

Core data models and commands (no UI dependencies).

  • Graph - Main graph container
  • Node - Node data model
  • Edge - Edge/connection data model
  • Port - Port data model

FlowGraph.Avalonia

Avalonia UI controls and rendering.

  • FlowCanvas - Main canvas control
  • FlowCanvasSettings - Configuration options

FlowGraph.Avalonia.Controls

UI components.

  • FlowBackground - Background patterns
  • FlowControls - Zoom controls
  • FlowMinimap - Overview minimap
  • FlowPanel - Positioned panels
  • NodeToolbar - Node action toolbar

FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering

Rendering infrastructure.

  • INodeRenderer - Node renderer interface
  • DefaultNodeRenderer - Base renderer
  • ThemeResources - Theme access

Additional Documentation

For tutorials and guides, visit flowgraph.prismify.co.
